metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7311 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
libxl in Xen 4.1.x through 4.6.x does not properly handle the readonly flagon disks when using the qemu-xen device model, which allows local guestusers to write to a read-only disk image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7311` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.4 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
libxen-ocaml - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
libxenstore3.0 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.1-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.3-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.3-armhf - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.4-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.4-arm64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-hypervisor-4.4-armhf - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-system-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
xen-system-arm64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
